txt.en: Unravel the Epic Story for Volume V: The Peace of Middle-earth.
The story continues in future updates!
The story continues in future updates!

Folk from lands both near and distant celebrate the marriage of King Aragorn II Elessar and Queen Arwen Und√≥miel, a union that promises to usher in a new era of peace for Gondor and all of Middle-earth. And yet Mithrandir urges you not to relax your guard, for such peace must be protected if the dream of it is to arrive.
